message.body: Hey Idk if you know what to get Steph or my brother for xmas but if you don't know what to get em I have a list of things they wanted but I can't get them bec I spent too much already. They are small items so if you need help let me know I can get em and then you just give me the money

Lol ok cool.. I told my brother the same thing cause I know he is busy and steph won't ask either of you for anything... They are items between $5 up to $40. So you guys can just pick the ones you like for her and then pay me
